name: workrave
description:
Workrave is a program that assists in the recovery and prevention of
Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI). The program frequently alerts you to
take micro-pauses, rest breaks and restricts you to your daily limit.
The program runs on GNU/Linux and Microsoft Windows.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: libx11
dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.

dependencies.name: py-cheetah
dependencies.description: Cheetah is a template engine and code generation tool.

dependencies.name: glib
dependencies.description:
GLib provides the core application building blocks for libraries and
applications written in C. The GLib package contains a low-level
libraries useful for providing data structure handling for C,
portability wrappers and interfaces for such runtime functionality as an
event loop, threads, dynamic loading and an object system.

dependencies.name: glibmm
dependencies.description: Glibmm is a C++ wrapper for the glib library.

dependencies.name: gtkplus
dependencies.description:
The GTK+ package contains libraries used for creating graphical user
interfaces for applications.

dependencies.name: gtkmm
dependencies.description: Gtkmm is the official C++ interface for the popular GUI library GTK+.

dependencies.name: libsigcpp
dependencies.description: Libsigc++ is a C++ library for typesafe callbacks
